posts.post_title: FS (Big Reduction) - T206 W. Johnson Portrait SC 150 649 op - PSA 4(mc)
posts.post_content:
For Sale - T206 Walter Johnson Portrait SC 150 649 overprint - PSA 4(mc).  An extremely sharp card (see photos) with a slight miscut.  $3750 venmo friends or $3865 pp gs, price includes priority shipping.  Will consider reasonable offers.  Please message if interested and thanks for looking.

Bob Intrieri
